title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and list models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node and browsers; same generate/chat/embed API surface as the Python lib.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM or chat backends in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent API for chat, generate, pull, list, delete, and embeddings.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed, async bindings to the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with chat history, prompt templates, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-like pair programmer.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) and Docker Compose examples maintained by Ollama team.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama; use local models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Native n8n node to call Ollama chat or generate endpoints inside no-code workflows.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama; supports .NET 6+ and ASP.NET Core integrations.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri-based desktop GUI for Ollama (Windows/Mac/Linux) with chat history and model switcher.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-dependent code.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir library wrapping Ollama API with GenServer and streaming for Phoenix LiveView apps.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot auto-configuration for Ollama; inject ChatModel or EmbeddingModel beans in any Spring app.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Reference RAG stack combining Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain in a single Docker Compose.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings any Ollama model into a server with slash commands and threads.
